column5: Does anyone know of any group in the Toronto area, one that preferably that gets kids out fishing, that I can donate a bunch of smaller lures I don't use anymore? I have a bunch of smaller Rapalas, Mepps spinners, plastics, etc.. that would be great for kids.  Thanks!
You can always try Big Brothers Big Sisters.  They could pass them on to one of their mentors who enjoys fishing with their little brother or little sister. Just a thought.
I think fishfarmer runs a kids fishing outing and may want it. just a thought.
Sell it online, and donate the money if you choose
